about_the_game:
Parcel Mania is a frantic online or local splitscreen party game supporting up to 4 players in a match. Your #1 goal? Collect and deliver the most parcels and become the best courier connoisseur of the match!





Collect parcels from their stations, or smack ‘em out of your friends hands. Whoever delivers them to the customers gets to rank up high in the scoreboard. And if you want to slow your friends down? Slap the customers and watch them weep! It’s all fair in the world of delivery.





Leap over walls, flip switches, zip through shortcuts and defy gravity itself to get your parcels to your customers no matter what. Talk about 'air mail'! In Parcel Mania, you're not just a courier – you're a gravity-defying delivery superhero. Just remember, capes are optional when you're leaping over walls and flipping through the air!





Pick from five distinct characters, each with their own quirky personality and style! Each character brings their own unique flair to the frantic parcel delivery action. So, who will you be today? The choice is yours – pick your favorite and deliver those parcels with style!





Setting traps for your friends is like being in a wacky game show – except the only prize is the sweet, sweet victory of watching them jump in surprise. It's not just about speed, it's about how you play the game – and a little bit of 'parcel-tactical' warfare!





Challenge your friends from across the globe or from across your couch – all for no price. Yep – Parcel Mania in its current or future versions will remain FREE TO PLAY. Now go get those customers their parcels and beat your friends!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650-Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Parcel Mania: Free Multiplayer Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650-Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Parcel Mania is a frantic online or local splitscreen party game supporting up to 4 players in a match. Your #1 goal? Collect and deliver the most parcels and become the best courier connoisseur of the match! Collect parcels from their stations, or smack ‘em out of your friends hands.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
